name: workshop-claude-code-amaleh-2026
prompt:
Create a DRAMATIC and EXCITING workshop announcement poster.

CRITICAL: ALL text MUST be in Hebrew.

Brand: Aviz - The Architect
Colors: Primary #22C55E (bright green), grays #374151, #4B5563, #111827
Style: Professional, educational, tech-forward, DRAMATIC

VISUAL CONCEPT - THE HOOK:
The avatar (The Architect) is sitting in front of a computer screen, with an expression of EXTREME AMAZEMENT and AWE - his eyes are wide open, jaw dropped, mind blown! 

From the computer screen, POWERFUL GREEN ENERGY (#22C55E) is EXPLODING outward like a supernova, filling the entire room with glowing green light rays, particles, and magical energy. The avatar is being hit by this wave of power, his hair/clothes blown back by the force.

The scene should feel like a moment of REVELATION - like discovering something that changes everything. Electric, powerful, transformative.

Workshop details to include:
- Title: קלוד קוד אמאל׳ה
- Subtitle: ה-$100 הכי מנוצלים אי פעם
- Date: יום חמישי 1.1.26
- Time: 20:00
- Platform: Zoom
- Free workshop indicator: סדנה חינמית

Make the text readable and prominent. The energy should frame the text, not obscure it.
The overall feeling should be: "This is going to blow your mind!"
